input.sentences: the table was set for our holiday dinner .
then we all had a great meal .
of course grandfather had many stories to tell us too .
output.sentences: The table was set beautifully for the holiday.
Soon, the whole family gathered around the table.
The prayers were led by our grandfather.
Afterwards, we enjoyed a delicious, homemade meal.
After dinner, our grandfather enlightened us with several stories of his childhood.
